item.title: Basic Visual Testing Automated in Travis
item.description: Ever since I have worked on websites I always hated the proces to testing pages in different browsers. And since I created the Scarecrow theme for Hugo and am actually using it on this website I've put off testing for as long as possible. But I noticed the other day the the homepage in chrome, chrome of all browsers, was all messed up.
